text: poor selection of food decore old  way to bright

smash burger has always been one of my favorite restaurants and i came in with high expectations for the new location they exceeded my expectations with the taste presentation and service despite being busy
i enjoy visiting this establishment on taco tuesday for their excellent hard beef tacos at an affordable cost

the sports bar offers highquality food with the pineapple chicken sandwich and gyro being particularly delicious the side salad although not as impressive was still tasty the establishment features live music and a friendly staff with entrees available from approximately 716 pm until 1000 am there is an outdoor patio and plenty of tvs to enjoy the game
impeccable service awesome ambiance amazing food

the food i consumed was really tasty but the only problem was the waitress who was quite rude and angry when i inquired about eating there she had already packaged it up without asking me if i wanted to take it away or eat it in which was a bit disappointing for a weary tourist who had been walking for hours
on a saturday afternoon the doors of the business were locked even though the posted opening time was 2 pm and several cars came and went making it impossible to conduct any business

upon arrival at the restaurant at 515 we discovered that it was empty but the staff were rude to us and refused to seat us without a reservation we observed another group being seated and then leaving the restaurant
10 bucks for wifi cheap bastards
food atmosphere and beer are always great the service here is the worst anywhere i have been in a long while its not just this visit its all four visits i have made in the last year

the restaurant is indistinguishable from the one located down the street although it may be slightly smaller nevertheless the food is of the same high quality however it can get quite busy making it difficult to get the attention of a server despite this making a small diversion from the strip for dinner is still worth it
the tacos were a delightful meal that i thoroughly enjoyed
the restaurant offers a variety of dishes that are sure to please including lamb saag and butter masala which may require some time to reach but are definitely worth the wait

we arrived at the restaurant at 515 and noticed that it was empty however when we tried to enter the staff were rude to us and turned us away because we did not have a reservation we observed another group being seated and then leaving the restaurant
the menu at this restaurant looks delicious but the food doesnt match up although the garlic fries are my favorite part of this place fries are a relatively easy dish to execute well
oh man do i love the new sushi rolls the mango roll the cali roll and the tuna roll are super yummy also the crabcream cheese wontons are super delish and i love the pad thai

i am not one to shy away from expressing my love for strawberry rhubarb pie and when i visited this place in march i was overjoyed to see that they had homemade jam on all the tables i couldnt help but feel a sense of excitement as i thought about the strawberry rhubarb jam and how much i loved it it was truly a glorious sight to behold

my goto stop on the way home from work is burger king but im always disappointed because my order is usually wrong and i have to wait a long time for my food at the drivethru i feel like its one of gods cruel jokes
what elements of a restaurants environment food and drink make for a pleasurable experience despite the service being consistently poor during my last four visits within the past year

i had a fantastic time and was particularly fond of the tacos

although the food was edible i found it to be overpriced and not worth the cost
i thoroughly enjoyed the tacos and they were a highlight of my experience

we decided to visit the only late night place at the wynn because it was the only option available to us at the time although the service was slow the food was good but not particularly impressive i believe that it may be more beneficial to look for late night dining options outside of the wynn in the future as i find it to be overpriced and not particularly worth it however the food itself tasted good

my food was truly delectable but the only complaint i had was with the waitress who was quite rude and angry when i asked if i could eat there she had already packaged the food without asking if i wanted to take it away or eat it in which was a bit disappointing for a weary tourist who had been walking for hours

whenever im on my way home from work i usually stop at a burger king but my orders are often wrong and i have to wait an unbearable amount of time at the drive thru this leads me to believe that burger king is one of the cruel jokes that gods play on me
the bands featured in this place would be excellent if they were actually hosting shows i have yet to attend a show here without a sign indicating that it has been cancelled

for a sports bar it has great food both the pineapple chicken sandwich and the gyro was delicious side salad not so much there was live music super friendly staff entrees from about 716 kitchen is open until 100am there is an outdoor patio and a ton of tvs

i enjoy grabbing a burrito across the street from work when i forget my lunch at home its a fast and affordable option that keeps me full for a few bucks i appreciate how they keep it simple and efficient

when i forget my lunch at home i often find myself quickly crossing the street to get a filling burrito thats both affordable and efficient i like how they keep it simple

this strip location offers the poorest service ive ever encountered even when i was sitting at the bar with an empty drink the bartender didnt ask if i wanted another drink despite passing by multiple times
